Package yaak.agent.communication

This package implements lower level communications services.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BroadcastChannel BroadcastChannel represents one-to-many communications.
ChannelListener ChannelListener represents an object that monitors data (object) transport (its arrival) over a channel.
CommunicationChannel CommunicationChannel represents one or more communication models.
CommunicationServer CommunicationServer handles point-to-point and publish/subscribe messaging.
CommunicationServerAdmin CommunicationServerAdmin handles communication server management.
MessageFilter MessageFilter represents an object that evaluates whether or not the receiver wants the current message.
MessageListener MessageListener represents an object that monitors message transport (its arrival) over a channel.
PointChannel PointChannel represents one-to-one communications.
 

Class Summary
AgentAddress AgentAddress encodes an agent identifier and location.
Configuration Configuration manages communications configuration data.
Executive Executive provides core communications functionality.
Message Message encodes an agent identifier and location.
Payload Payload is the transport wrapper for any data (object) that's sent over a channel.
PrivateChannelAdapter PrivateChannelAdapter provides "closed-loop" communication channels.
StringMessage StringMessage encodes an agent identifier and location.
 

Exception Summary
CommunicationException CommunicationException is the base exception class for communications-related exceptions.
CommunicationRuntimeException CommunicationRuntimeException signals unexpected communications-related exceptions.
 

Package yaak.agent.communication Description

This package implements lower level communications services.
